context_of_use: The customer wants to browse, search, and view product listings to find items more easily.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to find and view products easily.
description: The customer can browse, search, and view product listings and detailed product information.
triggering_event: The customer initiates a product browsing session.
preconditions: The customer is logged into the system.
postconditions: The customer has viewed product listings and details.
assumptions: The customer has an active account to log in.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to browse products by category.
The system shall allow customers to search for products by keyword.
The system shall allow customers to view product details.
main_flow: 1. Customer browses products by category → System displays product listings by category.
2. Customer searches for products by keyword → System displays search results matching the keyword.
3. Customer views product details → System displays detailed information about the selected product.
